name: The CAMMEN Project
description:
"Control to S.I.G.H.T-12. Consider this your warning! Although you have been selected to join the C.A.M.M.E.N Project your safety is NOT guaranteed. In case of failure on your end your access to the program will be revoked regardless of your survival, over."

Welcome to the C.A.M.M.E.N Project.

Wach out for 40 different alterations throughout your work hours! With keen sight, sharp mind, and reporting anything considered to be unnatural you are sure to survive your shift!
